thread.title: Suki and Immy Waterhouse Take Bedhead and Brows to Burberry’s Spring 2017 Front Row
thread.title_full: Suki and Immy Waterhouse Take Bedhead and Brows to Burberry’s Spring 2017 Front Row

title: Suki and Immy Waterhouse Take Bedhead and Brows to Burberry’s Spring 2017 Front Row
text: Suki and Immy Waterhouse Turn Bedhead Into a Sisters’ Signature in Burberry’s Front Row February 20, 2017 10:43 PM by Calin Van Paris Photo: Getty Images While Burberry’s parade of slicked-back updos and minimalist makeup for the runway made the case for a polished take on It Brit beauty, the fashion house’s front row offered up a compelling counter-theory. Sisters Suki and Immy Waterhouse, both longtime fans of the label, arrived at the evening show wearing crop tops and trademark takes on bohemian bedhead. Suki’s shoulder-sweeping blonde was finished with a bounce of curl and a sideswept bang—calling to mind the slept-in rock ’n’ roll glamour of 1960s-era Anita Pallenberg. Meanwhile, Immy’s waist-length, center-parted style swung loose over her shoulders and was finished with a hint of Glastonbury-ready bend. In addition to a shared shade of golden blonde, the sisters had one more beauty signature in common in the form of twinning brushed-up brows and a palette of cool pink makeup. Proof that while a dramatic haircut or quick-change red lip is worth its weight in shock value, some smartly reworked beauty classics will always turn heads.
